name: Gold Mine - Looking Glass Idle Game
name_original: Gold Mine - Looking Glass Idle Game
description:
A half-idle game designed for Looking Glass Portrait. You need to press the side button to move the blinking light and collect gold cube. But controlling is not a must, you can leave it there as a decoration. It even has a clock mode.

Control

F1 Toggle clock mode
F2 Reset score
Arrow buttons/Side buttons control blinking light
